entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
